description.zh-CN: 一个自动完成搜索输入组件，在用户输入时提供智能建议匹配。包含动态结果筛选、可自定义的建议呈现、键盘导航和防抖搜索，实现高效的查询输入。
description.en-US: An autocomplete search input component that provides intelligent suggestion matching as users type their queries. Features dynamic result filtering, customizable suggestion rendering, keyboard navigation, and debounced search for efficient query input.

description.zh-CN: 实用的自动完成实现，具有响应式建议、清晰的匹配突出显示和高效的筛选。通过有用的建议和流畅的建议导航增强搜索体验。
description.en-US: A practical autocomplete implementation with responsive suggestions, clear matching highlights, efficient filtering, and smooth animations. Enhances search experience with helpful suggestions, keyboard shortcuts, and smooth suggestion navigation for better user experience.
